AgnosticUI v2
Back to Components

Input Component Playground

Comprehensive showcase of AgnosticUI's Input component with complete label architecture, validation, and accessibility features.

1. Label Architecture (Complete Flexibility)

Demonstrates all label patterns with clear examples and use case explanations.

Standard Built-in Labels (Recommended)

<ag-input label="Email Address" type="email" required></ag-input>

Visually Hidden Labels (Screen Reader Only)

<ag-input label="Search" label-hidden type="search" placeholder="Search..."></ag-input>

External Label (Advanced Layouts)

<label for="custom-email">Custom Email</label>
<ag-input id="custom-email" no-label type="email"></ag-input>

aria-label Only (Icon-Only Inputs)

<ag-input aria-label="Search site" no-label type="search"></ag-input>

2. Input Types & Validation

Showcase all supported input types with proper validation states.

HTML5 Input Types

Textarea Mode

Validation States

Complex Validation

3. Size & Styling Variants

Complete demonstration of v1 parity features.

Size Variants

Styling Variants

Left and right addon slots with flex layout integration.

Complete form scenarios using various patterns and features.

6. Interactive Demo

Experiment with different combinations of properties and see the results in real-time.

React Integration

The ReactInput wrapper provides seamless integration with React applications while maintaining all the accessibility features and input patterns of the underlying web component.

Vue Integration

The VueInput wrapper provides seamless integration with Vue applications while maintaining all the accessibility features and input patterns of the underlying web component.

Svelte Integration

The SvelteInput wrapper provides seamless integration with Svelte applications using modern Svelte 5 patterns while maintaining all the accessibility features and input patterns of the underlying web component.
